attributes.comment:
This fee increase would be terrible. We are currently in the process of adopting
from China, we were approved throught the USCIS and our I-171H is due to expire
in May, we will not receive our child before then. We are spending almost $700 to
renew whith the USCIS, $600 for our homestudy update, co-pays for Dr.
physicals, tests ect. I think it is unfair that I should have to pay all this AGAIN
when I was alredy approved and the adoption hasn't taken place yet.

BUT: to increase these already unjustified fees would just be cruel! This won't
effect me,not this time, but for my fellow adoptive parents to be, I will speak up.
This money could be put to better use.

Thank you
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Pamela M. Snow
